body.head: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

lg.l: (She was really a raving beauty in her day.
With Mary Pickford curls in clouds and whirls.)
She was trying to think of something nice to say,
So she pointed to a page by her fellow star and sage,
And said: "I wish that I could write that way!"

body.ab: Note for line 1 : Victorian poet, married to Robert Browning.
Note for line 4: 4]Mary Pickford: Toronto-born stage and screen actress, "America's sweetheart," whose second husband was the swashbuckling Douglas Fairbanks.
